node.name: Excelsior JET
node.shortdescription:
Excelsior JET, a certified Java SE 6 JVM with an Ahead-Of-Time (AOT) compiler and installation toolkit, provides specific support for Eclipse RCP with a focus on code and data protection.

It enables developers to export Eclipse RCP applications in native code form and avoid the distribution of the easy-to-hack jar files altogether:

Benefits

  • Protect Intellectual Property by preventing bytecode decompilation and hiding sensitive data
  • Meet security requirements for safety-critical industries such as Transport, Energy, Healthcare, Defense, and others

- create time limited demos
- author application installers
- deploy without dependency on the JRE

Ease of use

With this Eclipse plug-in, you may protect your Eclipse RCP product and create an install package in a few mouse clicks.

Resources

Whitepaper: Two Ways of Securing Eclipse RCP Applications (obfuscation vs. native pre-compilation.)

Case studies: RCP developers share their experience with Excelsior JET.

Video tutorial: standalone tools providing the advanced features of Excelsior JET, such as Startup Optimizer, Java Runtime Slim-Down, installer branding, and others.

Excelsior JET for Eclipse RCP page: product information, sample applications, etc.
node.body:
Excelsior JET, a certified Java SE 6 JVM with an Ahead-Of-Time (AOT) compiler and installation toolkit, provides specific support for Eclipse RCP with a focus on code and data protection.

It enables developers to export Eclipse RCP applications in native code form and avoid the distribution of the easy-to-hack jar files altogether:

Benefits

  • Protect Intellectual Property by preventing bytecode decompilation and hiding sensitive data
  • Meet security requirements for safety-critical industries such as Transport, Energy, Healthcare, Defense, and others

- create time limited demos
- author application installers
- deploy without dependency on the JRE

Ease of use

With this Eclipse plug-in, you may protect your Eclipse RCP product and create an install package in a few mouse clicks.

Whitepaper: Two Ways of Securing Eclipse RCP Applications (obfuscation vs. native pre-compilation.)

Case studies: RCP developers share their experience with Excelsior JET.

Video tutorial: standalone tools providing the advanced features of Excelsior JET, such as Startup Optimizer, Java Runtime Slim-Down, installer branding, and others.
